heading: Mochibēshonmessēji
quotes1: Yume o mottara, sore o tsukande hanasanai yō ni shinakereba narimasen.
quotes2: Kao o tsuneni taiyō no hōkō ni mukete ireba, kage ga anata no ushiro ni ochimasu
quotes3: Chōsen suru karera ni fukanō wanai
quotes4: Warui nyūsu wa, jikan ga tatsu no ga hayai kotodesu. Yoi nyūsu wa, anata ga pairottoda to iu kotodesu.
qexplain1: Watashitachi no bijon wa, jinsei o ikiru kate to naru monodesu. Yume ga nakereba, watashitachi no jinsei wa muimi ni natte shimaimasu. Desukara, anata ga shinakereba naranai no wa, don'na jōkyōdeatte mo kibō o mochi tsudzukeru kotodesu. Yume o yurumeru to, yoi seikatsu o iji suru koto ga muzukashiku narimasu.
qexplain2: Tsuneni taiyō no hikari ni kao o mukete kudasai. Iikaereba, tsuneni akarui men, pojitibuna men o miyou to tsutomete iru to, yagate kage ga jibun no ushiro ni ochite kuru koto ni kidzukimasu. Don'nani kon'nan'na jōkyōdeatte mo, soko kara nukedasu hōhō wa kanarazu arimasu.
qexplain3: Kono in'yō wa, ketsui to nintai no chikara o tsutaemasu. Yorokonde doryoku shi, besuto o tsukuseba, hontōni fukanōna koto wa nai to iu koto o shisa shite imasu. Kadai o kokufuku shi seikōwoosameru ni wa, maemukina kangaekata to nandemodekiru shisei no jūyō-sei o kyōchō shite imasu.
qexplain4: Warui nyūsu wa, jikan ga tatsu no ga hayai kotodesu. Yoi nyūsu wa, anata ga pairottoda to iu kotodesu. Maikeru Altshuler-cho wa, jikan ga attoiumani sugite shimauga, jibun no jikan o dono yō ni tsukau ka o kontorōru suru chikara ga aru to iu imidesu. Jikan o dō tsukaitai ka, jinsei de nani o tassei shitai ka o kimeru no wa anata shidaidesu
